original_title: アタッカーズ完全監修 あなた、許して…。 アイポケ×ATTACKERS スペシャルコラボ企画
overview: Aipoke x ATTACKERS special collaboration project! Eri (Momo Sakurazora), who is loved by her husband, spends her days full of happiness, except for the fact that she spends less time with her busy husband. One day, when she meets her again, her classmate Hamano asks for her Eri. Hamano understands that marital ties and sexual love between men and women are separate things. Eri, who seeks moisture in her daily life, is a new wife who seeks stimulation.
title: Attackers Full Supervision Forgive Me, Darling... IdeaPocket x ATTACKERS Special Collab Momo Sakura
